PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04952020-06-25,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
Aeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Transport Regulations Concerning CUSMA (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORT REGULATIONS CONCERNING CUSMA (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) preserve the legal clarity of the Regulations; and (2) provide transparency and certainty for Canadian, United States and Mexican stakeholders, by replacing all North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) references with references to Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0150 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Department of Transport Regulations Concerning CUSMA (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORT REGULATIONS CONCERNING CUSMA (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) preserve the legal clarity of the Regulations; and (2) provide transparency and certainty for Canadian, United States and Mexican stakeholders, by replacing all North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) references with references to Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA).
